Shipping and delivery

During checkout, we’ll provide an estimated delivery date for every item in your bag, enabling you to select the shipping speed that works best for your needs.
Here are the costs for each of the options we offer:

No Rush Shipping

  • Nike Members: Free for orders of $50 or more, $5 for orders less than $50
  • Guests: Free for orders of $75 or more, $7 for orders less than $75

Standard Shipping

  • Nike Members: Free for orders of $50 or more, $5 for orders less than $50
  • Guests: Free for orders of $75 or more, $8 for orders less than $75
